TABLE.NAME: qtype_stack
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the main options for each Stack question

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key link to question.id

FIELD.NAME: questionvariables
FIELD.COMMENT: Maxima code that is run when the question is started to initialise variables.

FIELD.NAME: specificfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: CAS text for the specific feedback for the question.

FIELD.NAME: specificfeedbackformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The FORMAT_... for the specific feedback

FIELD.NAME: questionnote
FIELD.COMMENT: CAS text. This should be a short summary of which random variant of the question the student saw.

FIELD.NAME: questionsimplify
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to simplify expressions in the question text, question variables, etc.

FIELD.NAME: assumepositive
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to assume that variables are positive.

FIELD.NAME: markmode
FIELD.COMMENT: How scores are calculated.

FIELD.NAME: prtcorrect
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard feedback displayed for any PRT that returns a score of 1.

FIELD.NAME: prtcorrectformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Text format for prtcorrect.

FIELD.NAME: prtpartiallycorrect
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard feedback displayed for any PRT that returns a score between 0 and 1.

FIELD.NAME: prtpartiallycorrectformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Text format for the prtpartiallycorrect field.

FIELD.NAME: prtincorrect
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard feedback displayed for any PRT that returns a score of 0.

FIELD.NAME: prtincorrectformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Text format for the prtincorrect field.

FIELD.NAME: multiplicationsign
FIELD.COMMENT: The symbol to use for multiplication.

FIELD.NAME: sqrtsign
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to display square roots as surds.

FIELD.NAME: complexno
FIELD.COMMENT: How complex numbers should be displayed and represented.

TABLE.NAME: qtype_stack_inputs
TABLE.COMMENT: One row for each input in the question.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key referencing question.id.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the input element.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of input element this is.

FIELD.NAME: tans
FIELD.COMMENT: The model answer for this input, that could be part of a correct solution.

FIELD.NAME: boxsize
FIELD.COMMENT: The desired size for the input.

FIELD.NAME: strictsyntax
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether this input element should validate the input strictly.

FIELD.NAME: insertstars
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether this input should automatically insert *s where there is implicit multiplication.

FIELD.NAME: syntaxhint
FIELD.COMMENT: An optional initial value to display in the input to help the student know what to type.

FIELD.NAME: forbidwords
FIELD.COMMENT: Any additional words (e.g. function names) that the student is not permitted to use in this input.

FIELD.NAME: forbidfloat
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether floating point numbers should be rejected in this input.

FIELD.NAME: requirelowestterms
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether any fractions in the input must be given in lowest terms.

FIELD.NAME: checkanswertype
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the type of the students answer (expression, list, ...) should be validated to ensure it is the same as tans.

FIELD.NAME: mustverify
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the interpretation of this input must be verified by the student before it is graded.

FIELD.NAME: showvalidation
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the validation results for this input should be displayed.

TABLE.NAME: qtype_stack_prts
TABLE.COMMENT: One row for each PRT in the question.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to question.id.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name used to identify this PRT.

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum score this PRT can contribute to the question.

FIELD.NAME: autosimplify
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to automatically simplify the variables used in this tree.

FIELD.NAME: feedbackvariables
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional expressions that should be computed before evaluating this tree.

TABLE.NAME: qtype_stack_prt_nodes
TABLE.COMMENT: One row for each node in each PRT in the question.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to question.id

FIELD.NAME: prtname
FIELD.COMMENT: foreign key reference to qtype_stack_prts.name

FIELD.NAME: nodename
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique identifier for the node. Currently we use 1, 2, 3, ... but we are storing strings in case we want to move to more meaningful node names in future.

FIELD.NAME: answertest
FIELD.COMMENT: What answer test to apply at this node.

FIELD.NAME: sans
FIELD.COMMENT: What expression to feed into the sans side of the answer test.

FIELD.NAME: tans
FIELD.COMMENT: What expression to feed into the tans side of the answer test.

FIELD.NAME: testoptions
FIELD.COMMENT: Any options to pass to the answer test.

FIELD.NAME: quiet
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to suppress any feedback generated by the answer test.

FIELD.NAME: truescoremode
FIELD.COMMENT: How to adjust the score when the test is true.

FIELD.NAME: truescore
FIELD.COMMENT: The number used in the score adjustment when the answer test returns true.

FIELD.NAME: truepenalty
FIELD.COMMENT: The penalty to use when the test returns true.

FIELD.NAME: truenextnode
FIELD.COMMENT: The node name to go to next when the test returns true.

FIELD.NAME: trueanswernote
FIELD.COMMENT: The answer note to append when the test returns true.

FIELD.NAME: truefeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Any extra feedback to add when the test returns true.

FIELD.NAME: truefeedbackformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The text format of truefeedback.

FIELD.NAME: falsescoremode
FIELD.COMMENT: How to adjust the score when the test is false.

FIELD.NAME: falsescore
FIELD.COMMENT: The number used in the score adjustment when the answer test returns false.

FIELD.NAME: falsepenalty
FIELD.COMMENT: The penalty to use when the test returns false.

FIELD.NAME: falsenextnode
FIELD.COMMENT: The node name to go to next when the test returns false.

FIELD.NAME: falseanswernote
FIELD.COMMENT: The answer note to append when the test returns false.

FIELD.NAME: falsefeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Any extra feedback to add when the test returns false.

FIELD.NAME: falsefeedbackformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The text format of falsefeedback.

TABLE.NAME: qtype_stack_cas_cache
TABLE.COMMENT: Caches the resuts of calls to Maxima.

FIELD.NAME: hash
FIELD.COMMENT: The SHA1 hash of command. Used for quick look-ups

FIELD.NAME: command
FIELD.COMMENT: The Maxima code that was sent to Maxima.

FIELD.NAME: result
FIELD.COMMENT: The unpacked results from Maxima.
